column5: You'll love my place, a two-story house in a perfect mid-cities location between Dallas and Fort Worth.   5 minutes from AA Training Center. 8 minutes from DFW International Airport and rail station.  20 minutes from Love Field airport and downtown/uptown Dallas, American Airlines Center, AT&T Cowboy Stadium, Six Flags, Ranger Stadium, Grapevine Mills Mall, Southlake, Texas Motor Speedway.
